sentences.en: "Has there been an accident?" Gary asked, idly curious.
sentences.cn: “出什么事故了吗？”加里问道，漫不经心又好奇。

sentences.en: "I'm not meddling," Kenworthy said mildly, "I'm just curious."
sentences.cn: “我不是在多管闲事，”肯沃西温和地说，“我只是好奇罢了。”

sentences.en: "Why do you want to know that?" he demanded.—'Just curious. that'sall.'
sentences.cn: “你为什么想知道那件事？”他问道。——“只是好奇，仅此而已。”

sentences.en: By a curious twist of fate, cricket was also my favourite sport.
sentences.cn: 让人感到惊奇的是，板球碰巧也是我最喜欢的运动。

sentences.en: Curious pedestrians were ordered to move along.
sentences.cn: 好奇的路人被责令离开。

sentences.en: Don't be too curious about things you are not supposed to know.
sentences.cn: 对于你不应该知道的事情别去好奇地打听.

sentences.en: He felt a curious mixture of excitement and panic.
sentences.cn: 他有一种既兴奋又惊慌的奇怪感觉。

sentences.en: He grew curious about how to make a toy.
sentences.cn: 他对怎样制作玩具感到好奇.

sentences.en: Jones himself was a curious mixture of ra-dicalism and conservatism.
sentences.cn: 琼斯自己是个奇特的混合体，既保守又激进。

sentences.en: She's a curious mixture of stubbornness and servility.
sentences.cn: 她既固执又恭顺，令人捉摸不透。

sentences.en: Steve was intensely curious about the world I came from.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫非常想了解我以前生活的那个世界。

sentences.en: The interior was shielded from the curious gaze of passersby.
sentences.cn: 屋子内部被挡住了，以防路人好奇地张望。

sentences.en: The naval high command's response to these developments is rather curious.
sentences.cn: 海军最高指挥部对这些进展的回应十分反常。

sentences.en: There is a curious thing about her writings in this period.
sentences.cn: 她在这期间的著作与以往有所不同。

sentences.en: They were very curious about the people who lived upstairs.
sentences.cn: 他们对住在楼上的人感到很好奇。

sentences.en: We felt curious ( as to ) how she received the shocking news.
sentences.cn: 我们很想知道她听到这坏消息时的反应.

words.tran_cn: 好奇，好奇心；珍品，古董，古玩

trans.tran_cn: 求知欲强的，稀奇古怪的
